info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 5 at 8:28PM CDT until August 6 at 2:30AM CDT by NWS Grand Forks ND
info.description:
* WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...Portions of west central Minnesota, including the following county, Clay and southeast North Dakota, including the following county, Cass.
* WHEN...Until 230 AM CDT Wednesday.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Overflowing poor drainage areas. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 828 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 0.5 and 1.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Fargo, Moorhead, West Fargo, Dilworth, Reile's Acres, Oakport, Frontier, Prairie Rose, Briarwood, North River and Moorhead Airport.
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don't drown. Don't travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 AM CDT WEDNESDAY
